definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job
printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)

sentences.english: To supervise the management of printing industry.
Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸的印刷媒体和视听媒体均受政府监控。

sentences.english: It is possible to trim off any blank area after printing.
sentences.chinese: 地图印刷完毕后，可将空白部分裁切掉。

sentences.english: A new introduction has been prefixed to the third printing of the book.
sentences.chinese: 本书第三次印刷时前面增加了一篇新的序言。

sentences.english: A layout of an image to be printed such as a book cover .
sentences.chinese: 杂凑而成的东西将要印刷的图案设计，如书的封面。

sentences.english: The printing part adopts hanging plate roller, which could shorten the time of plate lock-up.
sentences.chinese: 印刷部采用挂版式版辊，可缩短装版时间。

sentences.english: The prices printed in menus were cheap.
sentences.chinese: 价格在菜单中印刷是廉宜的。

sentences.english: Committee reports for major legislation are published separately by the Government Printing Office. ent.
sentences.chinese: 关于主要法律的委员会报告单独公布在政府印刷所。

sentences.english: Quick dry, took for high-speed printing.
PE Packer is used for paper box, paper case, color printing corporation, etc.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙烯自动打包机用于纸盒，纸箱彩色印刷公司。

sentences.english: The influences of dry fading density phenomenon on the evaluation and control of presswork quality were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了干退密度现象对印刷品质量评价及控制的影响。

sentences.english: But, Hu said his company's chips do not contain the maps, which were put at the government's printing facilities.
sentences.chinese: 但胡称，公司的芯片未包含这张政府用于印刷的地图。

sentences.english: The geometry of the sans serif, all-caps typography provided that tie.
sentences.chinese: 几何形状的无衬，全帽印刷术提供配合。

sentences.english: Please write your name and address in print.
sentences.chinese: 姓名和地址请用印刷体书写。

sentences.english: The first printed books were made by putting ink on a wooden block and holding the paper against it.
sentences.chinese: 第一本印刷书是用纸紧贴涂有墨汁的木版制成的。

definition: color printing using several overlaid images
